content.rendered:
Directed by Shingo Natsume

Written by Tomihiko Morimi. Makoto Ueda

Cast .Colby Ryan. Janis Cox. Kelsee Ryan. Justin Lum. April Raymond. Annie Cushing. Vaisia Itaaehau. Julie Rowe. John Matthias. Barry Cox. Joshua Vallow. Benjamin Hyde

Language Japanese

Production Science SARU.

Certificate 16+

Season 1

Episodes 4
